subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade sled the visiting Miami Heat to a win over the Phoenix Suns, 107-92, in the first game between the teams since the Heat traded Shaquille O’Neal for Shawn Marion.
snippet: Dwyane Wade sled the visiting Miami Heat to a win over the Phoenix Suns, 107-92, in the first game between the teams since the Heat traded Shaquille O’Neal for Shawn Marion.
